article_title: Pelosi Blasts Boehner's 'Hubris' for Netanyahu Invite
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Thursday at her weekly briefing, House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (D-CA) blasted Speaker of the House John Boehner (R-OH) for inviting Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu to address Congress without consulting the administration by saying, “It’s hubris to say, ‘I rule, I’ll decide.'”

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Pelosi also took the press to task for not reporting Boehner has “unilaterally” lowered the members per committee, which is under his purview as speaker.

Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
